video.title: Bleach
video.synopsis: After teenager Ichigo Kurosaki acquires superpowers from wounded soul reaper Rukia Kuchiki, the two of them join forces to round up lost souls.

episodes.synopsis: A teenager who can see ghosts, Ichigo Kurosaki gains some of the powers shared by his new friend Rukia Kuchiki and becomes a Soul Reaper.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Rukia wants Ichigo to take over her Soul Reaper duties, but he refuses. A mysterious shadow begins following Orihime, a classmate with a sad past.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Orihime learns her brother is a Hollow, a soul that didn't pass peacefully to the Soul Society but lingered, pursuing those he loved most in life.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo's pal and classmate Chad Sado brings a cursed bird to school that's really the soul of a boy who lived a tragic life.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Rukia and Chad fight Shrieker, a vicious Hollow who has defeated many Soul Reapers and committed many crimes. But they can't beat him without Ichigo.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: At a supply shop, Rukia picks up a modified soul to take over Ichigo while he's pulling Soul Reaper duty, but it absconds with Ichigo's body.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Rukia and Ichigo track his body to an elementary school, where Ichigo struggles with the mischievous, fun-seeking soul inhabiting his physical form.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: On the anniversary of his mother's death, Ichigo intends to take the day off from Soul Reaper duties to visit her grave with the rest of his family.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo faces the Grand Fisher, a Hollow using a lure in the shape of a little girl whom Ichigo remembers seeing when his mother died.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: TV star Don Kanonji tapes his show "Spirit Hunter" at an abandoned hospital, where Ichigo finds a demi-Hollow being summoned for the program.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Rumors spread about Ichigo and Rukia's relationship when they keep disappearing from school to respond to Hollow alerts.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: To prove how useless Soul Reapers are, Uryu lures Hollows to town and soon they're everywhere, including one that threatens Chad and Ichigo's sister.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When a Hollow pays Orihime a visit at school, she attempts to defend her classmates and discovers her spiritual powers.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of battle, Ichigo learns that Uryu is a Quincy, a being with a long-standing grudge against Soul Reapers, but the two must join forces.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Rukia fears that Ichigo's battle with Menos Grande will attract the Soul Society's attention. Meanwhile, she and Uryu feel increasingly out of place.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Rukia runs into two reapers from the Soul Society: her brother Byakuya and Renji Abarai, who censure her for giving her powers to a human.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo squares off against Renji Abarai, but just as he's about to win, Byakuya Kuchiki steps in and deals him a fierce blow from his zanpakuto.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation begins, but it's all work and no play for Ichigo, who starts training with Urahara Kisuke to enter the Soul Society and save Rukia.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: In the Soul Society, Rukia learns that she'll face her punishment in 25 days. Ichigo struggles to bounce back from a near-death experience.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo completes the third lesson of Urahara's training and learns his zanpakuto's name, then reports to Urahara's shop for an important meeting.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and the others make it through to the Soul Society.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and crew defeat the giant, but their entrance into the Seireitei is far from smooth sailing.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: An arrogant, boar-riding bully named Ganju Shiba challenges Ichigo and his friends to a fight.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Kukaku Shiba agrees to catapult Ichigo and the others over the walls of the Seireitei with her own creation: the Flower Crane Cannon.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Chad, Uryu and Orihime concentrate on controlling their spirit energies for their flight into the Seireitei.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: During their flight into the Seireitei, Ichigo and the others get separated.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Within the Seireitei, a full-fledged search for the intruders is put into action. Meanwhile, Rukia is transferred to the Repentance Cell to await her execution.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and his fellow ryoka are forced to stay alert and on their toes as they continue to be hunted by Soul Reapers.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: News of the intruders' surprising strength spreads among the Soul Reapers, and the captains are eager for information.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Hanataro Yamada leads Ichigo and Ganju toward the Repentance Cell where Rukia is being held.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Renji and Ichigo engage in battle.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Renji faces defeat, and in his final moments recalls his childhood with Rukia in the Rukongai district of the Soul Society.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: In the world of the living, Don Kanonji recruits Ichigo's sisters and the kids from the supply shop to form a team fighting bad spirits.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Word of Renji's defeat spreads, and all-out war is declared against the ryoka.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: When a prominent captain of the Soul Reapers is found dead, they turn against one another amid a flurry of suspicion and accusations.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Ganju and Hanataro climb the Senzaikyu's great staircase -- the White Tower -- only to sense an unprecedented amount of spirit energy.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Chad's journey to the Senzaikyu is interrupted by the captain of Squad 8.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, still battling Capt. Zaraki, senses a loss of Chad's spirit energy and fears the worst.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: As he lies weak on the ground with sword wounds, Ichigo is greeted by a vision of an embodied version of his zanpakuto.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Ganju and Hanataro continue toward the Senzaikyu to save Rukia.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Sensing great spirit energy near the Repentance Cell, Ichigo defies Yoruichi's orders and flees to help Ganju and Hanataro.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: To get to Rukia, Orihime and Uryu disguise themselves as Soul Reapers.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: While dressed as Soul Reapers, Orihime and Uryu are offered help by Squad 12 -- but Uryu quickly realizes that the jig is up and the offer is a trap.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: The captain decides it would be better to capture Uryu and study his distinctive abilities rather than kill him.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Yoruichi trains Ichigo in the finer points of using his zanpakuto.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Momo Hinamori recalls her days at the Soul Reaper Academy, where she trained in the world of the living.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Momo, Renji and Izuru all escape.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: In her holding cell, Rukia has a dream that she believes will help her prepare for the next day's events.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: In her dream, Rukia recalls the time she spent training under Lt. Kaien Shiba and Capt. Jushiro Ukitake.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: In the world of the living, Don Kanonji tries to boost his television show's ratings by recruiting Kon as the program's mascot.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Preparations get under way for Rukia's execution.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: While Ichigo continues his bankai training, Renji tries to save Rukia.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: As a resigned Rukia is being led to her execution, the ever-devious Gin Ichimaru stops her and breaks her resolve by offering to let her live.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Rukia stands on the Sokyoku on the brink of execution, not knowing that help is on the way.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: While Renji hurries to get Rukia out of harm's way, Ichigo stays behind to hold off Byakuya.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Ukitake and Capt. Kyoraku face the punishment meted out by Capt. Yamamoto's zanpakuto.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Fueled by anger and feelings of abandonment and betrayal, Soi Fon persists in her attempt to destroy her former master, Yoruichi.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: The fierce battle between Byakuya and Ichigo rages on as he taunts Byakuya and demands that he use his bankai against him.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Though the power exerted by Ichigo may have impressed Byakuya, he's not done fighting yet.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: After breaking into the chambers of the Soul Society's highest judicial body, Hitsugaya and Matsumoto make a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: After defeating Hitsugaya, Capt. Aizen heads for the Execution Grounds. Renji is dumbfounded as he finds himself facing Aizen, Ichimaru and Tosen at Sokyoku Hill.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Furious after hearing news of the defection of three captains, Sajin Komamura arrives at Sokyoku ready to beat the treachery out of Aizen and his lackeys.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Peace returns, and Komamura and Hisagi visit graves of fallen comrades, as the Soul Society heals wounds left by the villainous Aizen and his crew.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: After returning from the Soul Society, Ichigo and his friends are finally able to get back to their "normal" lives.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and his friends meet at school and set out to look for Orihime the day after her disappearance.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: After Chad's kidnapping, Ichigo and the others go to Urahara to explain their predicament.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Chad and Orihime are rescued, but when Lirin tells them an impostor has replaced one of their friends, they realize the game isn't over.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Lirin sets in place a giant gate that begins to devour everything in Karakura -- and the only way to save the town is to destroy the gate.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: New information has come to light about an unusual race known as Bounts -- beings who attain eternal life by absorbing human souls.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and Lirin find themselves in a pinch when they're attacked by the Bount Yoshino Soma and her doll, Goethe.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Rukia, Orihime, Chad and Uryu surround the Bount Ryo Udagawa but find themselves at a slight disadvantage when he releases the immense power of his doll, Friede.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Uryu is hospitalized after being seriously hurt in the Bount attack. Knowing that Quincys are being targeted, Ichigo and the others decide to protect Uryu in the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and the others run from twin Bounts Ho and Ban, who have attacked them at the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Knocked unconscious during Ho and Ban's attack, Uryu is saved by Yoshino.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: While listening to the history of the Bounts at Yoshino's hideout, Uryu is attacked by a Bount named Koga. Uryu and Yoshino battle Koga's steel doll Dalk, but Yoshino's flame doll is no match for Dalk.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Rukia, Lirin, Noba and Kurodo enter the Bount mansion and come face to face with Jin Kariya and the other Bounts for the first time.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Udagawa, who betrayed Kariya, is brought down by former Squad 11 Soul Reaper Maki Ichinose -- who then turns his zanpakuto on Ichigo.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Yoruichi's surprise attack, Ichigo and his cohorts escape from Kariya's mansion. But Uryu and Yoshino have sustained serious injuries and are treated at Urahara's shop.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Yoshino leaves Urahara's shop at the crack of dawn. She's aware of Kariya's ambition and is determined to stop him even if it means risking her life.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Yoshino's death brings forth a massive number of new dolls known as Bitto for Kariya. As day breaks, Urahara casts a barrier around his shop so that Ichigo and the others will remain undetected by the Bounts.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Several days after Yoshino's death, Kariya's new Bitto dolls begin attacking humans and accumulating souls. The Soul Society secretly dispatches a contingent to the world of the living, but they're ineffective.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Rukia, Orihime and Chad desperately search the town for Renji when soul disappears after he's attacked by the Bitto.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Rukia and Orihime are having a difficult time battling Yoshi. They decide that Kurodo and Orihime should act as decoys to give Rukia time to unleash a powerful kido.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Sent by the Soul Society, Izuru saves Ichigo and takes over the fight with Dalk.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Possessed by Ritz, Rukia obeys Mabashi's orders to attack Orihime. When she tries to use her Shunshunrikka powers, Mabashi draws out Rukia's Soul Reaper powers.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Chad, Noba and Ururu confront the Bount Sawatari at a park. Just as the battle is about to begin, Matsumoto suddenly appears.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: After a fierce battle, Noba is defeated by Baura's immense power. The injured Noba musters all his remaining power and moves himself and his allies to another space before Baura can swallow him.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Rukia, Chad, Orihime, Noba and Kurodo regroup at Urahara's shop. While getting medical treatment, they discuss how the Bounts are fighting with more power than ever.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, Chad, Orihime and the others enter the cave of the Bounts. As they proceed cautiously, the eyes of the doll Gesell suddenly appear.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Near the end of Gesell's labyrinth, the doll reveals her true form to Ichigo and Renji. Ichigo stands ready with his zangetsu, but Renji steps forward and insists on facing her solo.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo is shocked when Kariya reveals that destroying the Soul Society is the true mission of the Bounts -- who are byproducts of the Soul Society's experiments.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Kariya and other Bounts arrive in the Soul Society and find themselves in a fight with Soul Reapers Lt. Omaeda and Lt. Iba. With the abundance of reishi in the Soul Society, the Bounts are able to absorb them quickly, giving the Bounts power.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: On her way back to rejoining Squad 13, Rukia fights with Yoshi in the Rukon district. But Rukia finds herself in a pinch because her spirit energy hasn't fully returned.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Hitsugaya and the others investigate the Senzaikyu, which Kariya and his group destroyed. Meanwhile, Rukia, who was injured in a fight with Yoshi, is treated at the Kuchiki house. Ichigo follows her there and asks Byakuya to help battle the Bounts.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Byakuya and Kariya start fighting in a forest in Kusajishi. During the battle, Byakuya finally releases his zanpakuto, but Kariya's invisible dolls bounce the Senbonzakura back.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo rushes to the site where Byakuya and Kariya are fighting and releases his bankai on Kariya. Byakuya also releases his bankai to attack Kariya, but Ichigo and Byakuya aren't in sync so they can't hurt Kariya.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: After learning that the Bounts have assembled mobs, Hitsugaya heads to the forest in Kusajishi with Rangiku and Renji to investigate. Meanwhile, buildings that Ichinose destroyed in the Seireitei are being restored.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Hitsugaya and the others arrive at the Bounts' hideout, where Ichinose is waiting for them. He plans to detain them to help Kariya and his group, who are headed for the Seireitei.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Kariya and the others successfully open the Seireimon using the mobs from Kusajishi. Upon entering, they attack not only the Soul Reaper guards but also the mobs -- and confusion reigns.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Soi Fon is poisoned by a member of her punishment force, which is under Ritz's control. Having increased her power, Ritz can control several Soul Reapers simultaneously.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Upon entering the Seireitei, Sawatari sees Mayuri Kurotsuchi, the captain of Squad 12 -- who proposes that he become a guinea pig for an experiment. But Sawatari refuses and attacks Mayuri using the Baura doll.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: As the battle between the Soul Reapers and Bounts intensifies, Kariya breaks into the Department of Research and Development, where he looks for an original Bount crest and interrogates Nemu.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Severely injured by Nieder's attack, Uryu tries desperately to counterattack, but his bow seems to have run out of power. Meanwhile, Yoshi revels in the fight in the Soul Society because she can do whatever she wants.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Hitsugaya -- along with the Soul Reapers of Squad 10 -- tries to capture Koga using Kurodo's Bount sensor. But Koga flees the Seireitei.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Hitsugaya has defeated Koga, leaving Kariya as the last surviving Bount. When Hitsugaya returns to the Squad 10 barracks, he finds that Ichigo and his friends have made themselves at home while Uryu recovers from his fight with Yoshi.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: During the battle between Kariya and Rantao, Kariya learns the origin of his powers. When Rantao pleads with Kariya to use the Jokai crest to save the Bounts, he's forced to recall his life of oppression and reasons for destroying the Soul Society.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo arrives just in time as Uryu and Rantao struggle to fend off Kariya. When Hitsugaya and the others try to go after Ichigo, Rantao stops them.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Ichigo and Kariya's final clash begins on Sokyoku Hill. Realizing that Kariya's fighting style consists of counterattacks that rely on his incredible ability to recover, Ichigo uses Tensa Zangetsu's speed to attack Kariya.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: With Kariya defeated and all of the Jokai crests sealed away, Ichigo and his friends rest until the Senkaimon is prepared so they can return to the world of the living.
episodes.title: Episode 109
